ygData.subject: Re: DElf Necro (9th) Needs hunting / exp / cash tips
ygData.msgSnippet: I m a 10lvl DE, and I went from 8-10 mostly in northern RO.  The tunnel to it is located on the opposite side of commons from entrance to Nectulos forest. I
ygData.messageBody:
I'm a 10lvl DE, and I went from 8-10 mostly in northern RO. The tunnel to it is
located on the opposite side of commons from entrance to Nectulos forest.
I hunt scarabs and desert tarantulas at northern RO. Scarabs are best, since they do
not poison, their carapace is worth a gold or so, you can take yellow ones fairly easy:
lifetap, cast DOTs, keep your pet alive and get some hits in. Watch out for madman and
people training mummies. Mummies can be difficult at 8-9. Melissa Sandwhisper an NPC
merchant close to zone border with freeport is tolerant enough to sell to me, she
carries water and rations.



Renaissance Man wrote:

> From: "Renaissance Man" <cossettb@...>
>
> I'm frustrated. I've got a level 9 Necro DElf, based in Nekk Forest. I've
> got 2 problems: a lack of cash and difficulty in gaining exp.
>
> I've been in in Nekk Forest, and I prefer to solo for the most part. The
> problem is finding targets to hunt. In Nekk forest, the only mobs that give
> me experience are Kodiaks and some skeletons. Mummies and zombies too, but
> those are even more rare, plus there's usually 3-4 other PC's camped at the
> spawn sites. The Lava zone seems to be too high-level for me (from reports
> from others), and while Eastern commons isn't too bad the Griffins are
> murder and getting poisoned by an asp has killed me twice. Last time I went
> through the commons I died enough that I lost all the exp. gained.
>
> On top of this is cash flow problems. Since the rank 3 spells each cost 4.5
> pp, it's bloody expensive getting them. I picked up tailoring as a trade to
> hopefully help get extra money, but my skill is maxed at 30 from patchwork
> armor, and I don't know that I want to take up smithing to increase it some
> more (by making studded and re-inforced etc.). I've considered maybe taking
> up another trade to help with getting extra money. Any suggestions?
>
> Desperately waiting to hit 12th level and get some decent offensive spells .
> . .
>
> Brad Cossette - cossettb@...
> Sabbaoth (Dark Elf Necro 9) - Bertoxxulous
> "My advice to you is to get married. If you find a good wife,
> you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher." - Socrates
>
